comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Perhaps "Sir John Pepys Lister-Kaye, 3rd Baronet (1853-1924)" as listed on en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kaye_baronets A 1918 portrait is at www.npg.org.uk/collections/search/portrait/mw112020/Sir-J... Certainly could be the same person.

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: I believe you are right, swanq.  The man in both pictures look identical.  We will update the record, and thanks for the additional information.
